docs.title: Home
docs.text: Welcome to this page

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: The configuration file of Xray is in JSON format, and the configuration format for the client and server is the same, except for the actual configuration content.

docs.title: Form:
docs.text:
{
  "vsersion": {},
  "log": {},
  "api": {},
  "dns": {},
  "routing": {},
  "policy": {},
  "inbounds": [],
  "outbounds": [],
  "transport": {},
  "stats": {},
  "reverse": {},
  "fakedns": {},
  "metrics": {},
  "observatory": {},
  "burstObservatory": {}
}

docs.title: version
docs.text: This setting controls which versions this config can run on. It helps prevent the config from running on unintended client versions when shared. The client will check at runtime whether the current version meets this requirement.

docs.title: log
docs.text: Log configurations, controlling how Xray emits logs.

docs.title: api
docs.text: Provides some API interfaces for calling remotely.

docs.title: dns
docs.text: Configures the built-in DNS server. System DNS will be used if not configured.

docs.title: routing
docs.text: Configures routing. Specify rules to route connections through different outbounds.

docs.title: policy
docs.text: Local policy configurations, specifying different user levels and corresponding policies.

docs.title: inbounds
docs.text: An array of inbound connection configurations.

docs.title: outbounds
docs.text: An array of outbound connection configurations.

docs.title: transport
docs.text: Configures how Xray establishes and uses network connections to other servers.

docs.title: stats
docs.text: Configures traffic statistics.

docs.title: reverse
docs.text: Configures the built-in reverse proxy. You can forward server traffic to the client, effectively achieving reverse proxying.

docs.title: fakedns
docs.text: FakeDNS configuration. Can be used with a transparent proxy to obtain the actual domains.

docs.title: metrics
docs.text: Metrics configuration. A more straightforward (and hopefully better) way to export metrics.

docs.title: observatory
docs.text: Background connection observation. Detect the connection status of outbound proxies.

docs.title: burstObservatory
docs.text: Concurrent connection observation. Detect the connection status of outbound proxies.

docs.title: VLESS
docs.text:
Currently, VLESS does not provide built-in encryption. Please use it with a reliable channel, such as TLS.

VLESS is a stateless lightweight transport protocol that consists of inbound and outbound parts. It can serve as a bridge between Xray clients and servers. Unlike VMess, VLESS does not rely on system time. The authentication method is still UUID-based.

docs.title: InboundConfigurationObject
docs.text:
{
  "clients": [
    {
      "id": "5783a3e7-e373-51cd-8642-c83782b807c5",
      "level": 0,
      "email": "",
      "flow": "xtls-rprx-vision",
      "reverse": {}
    }
  ],
  "decryption": "none",
  "fallbacks": [
    {
      "dest": 80
    }
  ]
}

docs.title: clients
docs.text: An array representing a group of users approved by the server. Each item in the array is a user.

docs.title: decryption
docs.text: Currently, you need to specify "none". It cannot be left empty. If the decryption value is not set correctly, you will receive an error message when using Xray or -test.

docs.title: fallbacks
docs.text: An array that contains a series of fallback configurations.

docs.title: ClientObject
docs.text:
{
  "id": "5783a3e7-e373-51cd-8642-c83782b807c5",
  "level": 0,
  "email": "",
  "flow": "xtls-rprx-vision"
}

docs.title: id
docs.text:
The user ID for VLESS. It can be any string less than 30 bytes or a valid UUID.

Execute xray uuid -i "custom strings" to generate the UUID corresponding to a custom string. Execute xray uuid to generate a random UUID.

docs.title: level
docs.text:
The user level that the connection will use to determine the corresponding.

The value of level corresponds to the value of policy.level.The default value is 0.

docs.title: email
docs.text: User email address used to differentiate traffic from different users.

docs.title: flow
docs.text:
Flow control mode used to select the XTLS algorithm. Additionally, XTLS currently only supports TCP+TLS/Reality.

The following flow control modes are available for inbound protocols:

mode algorithm Use regular TLS proxy xtls-rprx-vision Use the XTLS mode, including inner-handshake random padding

docs.title: 首页
docs.text: 欢迎来到此页面

docs.title: 概述
docs.text: Xray 的配置文件为 json 格式, 客户端和服务端的配置格式相同, 仅实际的配置内容不同。

docs.title: 形式:
docs.text:
{
  "vsersion": {},
  "log": {},
  "api": {},
  "dns": {},
  "routing": {},
  "policy": {},
  "inbounds": [],
  "outbounds": [],
  "transport": {},
  "stats": {},
  "reverse": {},
  "fakedns": {},
  "metrics": {},
  "observatory": {},
  "burstObservatory": {}
}

docs.title: version
docs.text: 控制该 config 可以运行的版本，当分享 config 时防止在不期望的客户端版本意外运行，运行时客户端将会检查当前版本是否匹配该要求。

docs.title: log
docs.text: 日志配置，控制 Xray 输出日志的方式。

docs.title: api
docs.text: 提供了一些 API 接口供远程调用。

docs.title: dns
docs.text: 内置的 DNS 服务器. 如果没有配置此项，则使用系统的 DNS 设置。

docs.title: routing
docs.text: 路由功能。可以设置规则分流数据从不同的 outbound 发出。

docs.title: policy
docs.text: 本地策略，可以设置不同的用户等级和对应的策略设置。

docs.title: inbounds
docs.text: 一个数组，每个元素是一个入站连接配置。

docs.title: outbounds
docs.text: 一个数组，每个元素是一个出站连接配置。

docs.title: transport
docs.text: 用于配置 Xray 其它服务器建立和使用网络连接的方式。

docs.title: stats
docs.text: 用于配置流量数据的统计。

docs.title: reverse
docs.text: 反向代理。可以把服务器端的流量向客户端转发，即逆向流量转发。

docs.title: fakedns
docs.text: FakeDNS 配置。可配合透明代理使用，以获取实际域名。

docs.title: metrics
docs.text: metrics 配置。更直接的统计导出方式。

docs.title: observatory
docs.text: 后台连接观测。探测出站代理的连接状态。

docs.title: burstObservatory
docs.text: 突发连接观测。探测出站代理的连接状态。

docs.title: VLESS
docs.text:
目前 VLESS 没有自带加密，请用于可靠信道，如 TLS。

VLESS 是一个无状态的轻量传输协议，它分为入站和出站两部分，可以作为 Xray 客户端和服务器之间的桥梁。 不同于 VMess，VLESS 不依赖于系统时间，认证方式同样为 UUID。

docs.title: 入站配置
docs.text:
{
  "clients": [
    {
      "id": "5783a3e7-e373-51cd-8642-c83782b807c5",
      "level": 0,
      "email": "",
      "flow": "xtls-rprx-vision",
      "reverse": {}
    }
  ],
  "decryption": "none",
  "fallbacks": [
    {
      "dest": 80
    }
  ]
}

docs.title: clients
docs.text: 一个数组，代表一组服务端认可的用户，其中每一项为一个用户。

docs.title: decryption
docs.text: 现阶段需要填 "none"，不能留空。若未正确设置 decryption 的值，使用 Xray 或 -test 时会收到错误信息。

docs.title: fallbacks
docs.text: 一个数组，包含一系列回落分流配置。

docs.title: 客户端配置
docs.text:
{
  "id": "5783a3e7-e373-51cd-8642-c83782b807c5",
  "level": 0,
  "email": "",
  "flow": "xtls-rprx-vision"
}

docs.title: id
docs.text:
VLESS 的用户 ID，可以是任意小于 30 字节的字符串, 也可以是一个合法的 UUID.

执行 xray uuid -i "自定义字符串" 生成自定义字符串所映射的的 UUID. 执行 xray uuid 生成随机的 UUID.

docs.title: level
docs.text:
用户等级，连接会使用这个用户等级对应的本地策略。

level 的值, 对应 policy.level 的值，默认为 0。

docs.title: email
docs.text: 用户邮箱，用于区分不同用户的流量。

docs.title: flow
docs.text:
流控模式，用于选择 XTLS 的算法。 目前 XTLS 仅支持 TCP+TLS/Reality

入站协议中有以下流控模式可选：

模式 算法 使用普通 TLS 代理 xtls-rprx-vision 使用 XTLS 模式，包含内层握手随机填充
